class VMShow {
    private int basicInt = 1;
    private Integer objInt = 2;
    private static Integer staticInt = 3;
    private String basicString = "basicString";
    private static String staticString = new String("staticString");

    # åˆ†æString.intern

    public class StringInternTest {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        String s1 = new String("he") + new String("llo"); //  1
        s1.intern(); // 2
        String s2="hello"; // 3
        System.out.println(s1==s2); // true

        String s3 = new String("1") + new String("2"); // 4
        String s4 = "12"; // 5
        s3.intern(); // 6
        System.out.println(s3 == s4);  // false
    }
}

    ä¸Šè¿°åœ¨ç¼–è¯‘å™¨ç¡®å®šçš„å­—é¢é‡æœ‰Â he,Â llo,Â hello,Â 1,Â Â 2,Â 12ï¼Œä½†åœ¨çœŸæ­£æ‰§è¡Œåˆ°è¯­å¥å‰ï¼Œç¬¦å·å¼•ç”¨ä¸ä¸€å®šè§£ææˆç›´æ¥å¼•ç”¨ï¼Œå³å­—é¢é‡å¯¹åº”çš„å¯¹è±¡ä¼šåœ¨æ‰§è¡Œåˆ°è¯­å¥æ—¶ï¼ˆidcÂ æŒ‡ä»¤ï¼‰æ‰ä¼šåˆ›å»º
